creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist
description: four pieces: realistic ceramic newspaper pages all the same front page of "Cultural News"; two of the pieces are coated in gold; one of the gold pieces is somewhat folded, while the other is bundled up like a parcel; other two pieces are realistically crumpled
inscription: inscribed bottom of 2013.29.1046a: [To Willard & Bill CLARK/ I express my heartly thanks to you/ From Kimiyo Mishima / 2007.4.9]; bottom of piece d, inscription and marker: [To Willard and Bill Clark / I express my hearty thanks to you / Kimiyo Mishima / 2007.4]
signed: signature inscribed on bottom of a with inscription and date; inscribed on piece b, back L side: [Kimiyo Mishima]; inscribed on back of piece c: [Kimiyo Mishima]; inscribed on bottom of d with inscription and date
title: Cultural News
